Package frc.robot

Class DriveTankSystem

java.lang.Object
frc.robot.DriveTankSystem
public class DriveTankSystem extends Object
The TankDriveSystem is a pseudo static class that implements all functions necessary for a robot tank drive.
File: TankDriveSystem.java

Referenceable items: (classes)
TankDriveSystem.SetSpeedTarget
TankDriveSystem.Execute

Depends on:
sendable - Network table helper functions...
Operating system specifics:
None - transportable

Notes:
For this to work correctly, the execute method needs to be called every 20 millisecond robot cycle.

========================== Version History ==================================================
1.00 09/28/2025 Jim Simpson Created.

2025-09-28

    • setSpeedTarget

      public static void setSpeedTarget(double leftSpeedTarget_FPS, double rightSpeedTarget_FPS)
      Set the tank drive speed target for left and right wheels.
      Parameters:
      leftSpeedTarget_FPS - - double - Desired left wheel speed FT/SEC
      rightSpeedTarget_FPS - - double - Desired right wheel speed FT/SEC

      public static boolean getGyroConnected()

      Returns:

    • init

      public static void init()
      Initialize the TankDrive System.

    • Execute

      public static void Execute()
      Executes the logic of the tank drive system. This should be called every 20 milliseconds. It will eventually output values to the motor controllers.
